title: Under: Depths of Fear – v1.0.1

Repack Features

  • Based on Steam release Build 5740551: 2.7 GB, thanks to valtrix1982!
  • Game version is: v1.0.1
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 2.7 GB to 711 MB)

  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 2.7 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Can anything be worse than the living hell you’ve endured in the trenches? You thought it was all over, although now things are only getting worse than you’ve ever imagined. Where are you? When did it end? Is it over? The only thing you can do now is try and save your own miserable life like you did before.

Find yourself in the shoes of traumatized WWI veteran Alexander Dockter who ends up in an eerie turn-of-the-century era ocean liner on its way to the bottom of the ocean. As if trying to escape a colossal sinking ocean liner in the middle of the night isn’t frightening enough, you find out that your escape is sabotaged by malicious entities that seem to want something from you. Test your fears and find out whether you can escape while all elements turn against you in this classic horror experience.
